external_references.source_name: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023
external_references.description: NSA et al. (2023, May 24). People's Republic of China State-Sponsored Cyber Actor Living off the Land to Evade Detection. Retrieved July 27, 2023.

description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has executed multiple commands to enumerate network topology and settings including  `ipconfig`, `netsh interface firewall show all`, and `netsh interface portproxy show all`.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023)
